text: House Party is a 1990 American comedy movie. The movie is about a group of teenagers who attend a house party. Robin Harris plays Christopher, Kid's father. Martin Lawrence plays Bilal. Tisha Campbell plays Sydney. House Party was released on March 9, 1990. It got positive reviews from critics. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1990 movies Category:1990s teen comedy movies Category:American teen comedy movies Category:Buddy movies Category:English- language movies Category:American independent movies
title: House Party
